items.sentence: I was the one who taught Tom how to shoot a gun.
Do you really think that's absolutely necessary?
One of my friends is waiting for me at the gate.
Tom doesn't speak French, and neither does Mary.
Tom broached the subject with Mary at breakfast.
Tom and Mary's vacation turned into a nightmare.
Tom thought everything would turn out just fine.
Tom participated in the ice carving competition.
I have to help Tom. He's my own flesh and blood.
I don't understand what's so special about that.
